author: Daniel Arkin
description: This is a free article for Diddy on Trial newsletter subscribers.
title: Diddy trial judge meets with lawyers to discuss jury instructions

author: Adam Edelman
description: New York City's high-profile mayoral primary this week shined a bright light on the nation’s ongoing experiment with ranked choice voting.
title: New York City's mayoral primary casts bright light on ranked choice voting — and its future nationally

author: Jo Yurcaba
description: The Trump administration said California violated Title IX by allowing transgender students to compete on school sports teams that align with their gender identities.
title: Trump administration says California violated Title IX by letting trans athletes compete

author: The Politics Desk
description: Zohran Mamdani’s rise over Andrew Cuomo in the New York City mayoral race has prompted a reckoning in the Democratic Party.
title: The Democratic Party's Mamdani moment: From the Politics Desk

author: David K. Li
description: Federal prosecutors want to tighten their case against Sean Combs, asking a judge to strike language regarding "attempted" kidnapping and arson from jury instructions, according to court documents filed Tuesday
title: Diddy trial: Government wants 'attempted' arson and kidnapping allegations removed from jury instructions

author: Julie Tsirkin
description: Health care providers, physicians, hospital associations and even some GOP lawmakers are sounding the alarm on the impact of the legislation.
title: Rural communities brace for Medicaid cuts in Republicans' big bill

author: The Associated Press
description: Nestle said Wednesday it will eliminate artificial colors from its U.S. food and beverages by the middle of 2026
title: Nestle says it will remove artificial dyes from US foods by 2026

author: Alexander Smith
description: Iran’s exiled crown prince says a revolution in his homeland can be led not from the streets of Tehran, but in an 18th-century conference center in the heart of Paris.
title: Iran's exiled crown prince sees a chance for regime change

author: Allan Smith
description: President Donald Trump has been carrying out the delicate art of diplomacy in the Israel-Iran conflict through blunt social media posts on Truth Social.
title: Trump navigates a complex foreign policy crisis one 'Truth' at a time

author: Suzanne Gamboa
description: Press groups are calling for the release of Mario Guevara, an independent journalist who faces deportation after he was arrested and charged with misdemeanors while covering a protest.
title: Backlash after ICE detains journalist covering 'No Kings' immigration protests

author: Leslie Josephs, CNBC
description: Southwest Airlines is considering airport lounges, more premium seating and even long-haul international flights.
title: Southwest airport lounges? CEO says carrier is open to even more high-end changes

description: RFK Jr.'s views on vaccines loomed over Susan Monarez’s Senate confirmation hearing Wednesday to be the next director of the CDC.
title: RFK Jr. and vaccines loom over Senate confirmation hearing for CDC director

description: The numbers behind Zohran Mamdani’s upset performance over former Gov. Andrew Cuomo in New York City's Democratic mayoral primary.
title: How — and where — Zohran Mamdani catapulted to the top of Democrats’ New York City mayoral primary

author: Marlene Lenthang
description: An attorney representing rapper Fat Joe’s former hype man was arrested Wednesday, accused of hitting a process server with his car in New York City.
title: Attorney for Fat Joe's former hype man arrested, accused of hitting process server with his vehicle

author: Jeff Cox, CNBC
description: The Federal Reserve on WednesdThe Federal Reserve on Wednesday proposed easing a key capital rule that banks say has limited their ability to operate, drawing dissent from at least two officials who say the move could undermine important safeguards
title: Divided Fed proposes rule to ease capital requirements for big Wall Street banks

author: Ben Kamisar
description: Zohran Mamdani’s dramatic, strong showing in New York City’s Democratic mayoral primary, where he forced a concession from former Gov. Andrew Cuomo, amounts to a massive shot in the arm for progressives and other Democrats who have been imploring their party’s elder statesmen to step aside for a new generation of leaders.
title: What Zohran Mamdani's rise in New York City means for the Democratic Party nationally

author: Lillian Rizzo, CNBC
description: rall?
title: Women's Tennis Association extends media rights deal with Tennis Channel through 2032

author: Samantha Subin, CNBC
description: Bumble shares rallied more than 26% on Wednesday after the dating app company revealed in a securities filing that it intends to slash 30% of its workforce, or about 240 roles
title: Bumble shares jump 26% as dating company plans to axe 30% of workforce

author: Annie Palmer, CNBC
description: Amazon’s Ring video doorbell division is rolling out AI-generated notifications alerting users to unusual or suspicious activity around their home, the company said Wednesday
title: Amazon's Ring launches AI-generated security alerts

author: Evan Bush
description: Some former employees of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration who were fired, rehired and fired again this spring say they have received debt notices from the federal government to pay it back for health care coverage.
title: Fired, rehired and fired again, some NOAA employees get letters demanding money

author: Diana Olick, CNBC
description: Sales of new single-family homes dropped 13.7% in May compared with April to 623,000 units on a seasonally adjusted, annualized basis, according to the U.S.
title: Sales of new homes tanked in May, pushing supply up to a 3-year high

author: Aria Bendix
description: A federal vaccine advisory committee plans to review the childhood vaccination schedule and scrutinize vaccines that have been approved for decades, fueling concerns that the panel may consider changes to long-standing vaccine recommendations.
title: RFK Jr.-appointed CDC vaccine panel says it will scrutinize the childhood vaccine schedule

author: Matt Lavietes
description: A social media fitness influencer known as the "Liver King" was arrested on Tuesday after posting threatening messages directed to popular podcaster Joe Rogan on social media, according to police
title: 'Liver King' influencer arrested in Texas after threatening Joe Rogan

description: The Baseball Hall of Fame announcer and Dodgers ambassador expressed support for immigrants in an emotional post, saying it hurt him to see people detained by federal agents.
title: Legendary Dodgers announcer Jaime Jarrín speaks out on immigration raids

author: Alexander Smith
description: Arguably few things better demonstrate NATO bending over backward to please President Donald Trump than this remark by the military alliance's secretary-general, Mark Rutte.
title: Call him Daddy: NATO chief's comments betray reality of military alliance's take on Trump

author: Joyann Jeffrey, TODAY
description: Not only is Amber Glenn a figure skating champion, but she’s also a legend in the LGBTQ community
title: Figure skater Amber Glenn says embracing her sexuality 'unapologetically' has helped her fans

description: NBC News' Kelly O'Donnell asked President Trump about his message to the intelligence community as he disputes an assessment of the damage done to Iranian nuclear sites. The president stood by his comments that the facilities were "obliterated" in the strikes and called the assessment "not a complete report."
title: Trump says assessment of Iran nuclear facility damage was 'not a complete report'

description: President Trump gave a press conference at the NATO summit in the Netherlands and said that Russian President Putin called him days ago to offer help with the conflict between Iran and Israel. President Trump said he brushed off Putin’s offer and instead said the U.S. was more interested in working with Putin on settling the conflict between Russia and Ukraine.
title: Trump says Putin called to offer help with Iran conflict

description: Former Massachusetts Sen. Scott Brown is making another run for the Senate in New Hampshire
title: Republican Scott Brown launches New Hampshire Senate run

author: Doha Madani
description: Taylor Swift might not know ball but she does know that football players are gonna play, play play.
title: Taylor Swift takes the stage in surprise Nashville performance

description: The Justice Department and lawyers for Kilmar Abrego Garcia, the man the Trump administration mistakenly deported to El Salvador, will debate the terms of his release from federal custody on Wednesday, as he awaits trial for smuggling charges
title: Kilmar Abrego Garcia's release terms to be debated in court hearing

author: Chantal Da Silva
description: Fears that Iran's regime could use the conflict with Israel to crack down on its own population grew after three people were executed and hundreds more arrested.
title: Execution of 3 accused of spying and mass detentions fuel crackdown fears in Iran

description: Internal ICE data obtained by NBC News shows 6% of known immigrant murderers have been detained and arrested from October through May, despite the arrest of over 185,000 immigrants. NBC News' Julia Ainsley reports on the data and why it's a challenge to detain those who have committed crimes.
title: Data shows ICE has detained and arrested 6% of known immigrant murderers

author: Holly Ellyatt, CNBC
description: NATO allies on Wednesday agreed to more than double their defense spending target from 2% of gross domestic product to 5% by 2035, in the most decisive move from the alliance in over a decade
title: NATO allies agree to higher 5% defense spending target

author: Marlene Lenthang
description: A DoorDash executive and members of his family have been identified among the eight people who died in a boating accident on Lake Tahoe over the weekend
title: DoorDash exec and his parents ID'd as victims of deadly Lake Tahoe boating accident that killed 5 others

description: After working for the Rochester Red Wings, Bruce, the bat dog, was recently called up to the Washington Nationals — and the video of the golden retriever fetching bats during a game has gone viral. Bruce, and his owner and trainer, Josh Snyder, stop by Studio 1A, where Snyder opens up about his dog’s popularity and Bruce shows off some of his bat-fetching skills.
title: Bruce the MLB's Bat Dog Shows off Bat-Fetching Skills on TODAY!

author: Drew Weisholtz, TODAY
description: Arizona Diamondbacks manager Torey Lovullo jumped to the aid of second baseman Ketel Marte after a fan ridiculed the player’s late mother, according to MLB.com.The incident happened when the Diamondbacks were playing the Chicago White Sox at Chicago’s Rate Field on June 24.
title: MLB Player consoled by manager after fan reportedly yells about his late mom midgame

description: Former Duke basketball star Cooper Flagg sits down with TODAY’s Craig Melvin to speak out ahead of the highly-anticipated NBA draft where the 18-year-old is expected to hear his name called as the number overall pick by the Dallas Mavericks. Flagg shares how basketball is a way of life for his family, looks back on his viral scrimmage against Team USA stars including Steph Curry and LeBron James, and reveals how he likes to de-stress on the golf course.
title: Cooper Flagg Talks NBA Draft, Family Support, Golfing to Destress

author: Mithil Aggarwal
description: With a pair of bears on the loose, police were called and a firearms unit dispatched at the wildlife park in southwest England.
title: Bears eat 'a week's worth' of honey after escaping enclosure

author: Olympia Sonnier
description: The state of Maine, often associated with breathtaking nature and lobster rolls, is about to be front and center at this year’s NBA draft, as Cooper Flagg is expected to make history as the first No. 1 pick from the Pine Tree State.
title: Cooper Flagg is the pride of Maine, and he's psyched to represent it in the NBA

description: The president met with NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte this morning before joining the plenary session at the alliance's annual summit in the Netherlands.
title: Trump to speak at NATO summit

description: Watch live coverage as President Trump holds a press conference at the NATO summit in the Netherlands.
title: Trump holds press conference at NATO summit

description: 33-year-old Democratic socialist and New York assembly member Zohran Mamdani pulled off a major upset against former New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo in the Democratic primary for New York City mayor. Mamdani was polling just 1% a few months ago but gained prominence online with viral videos and a strong debate performance. For Cuomo, it’s a major setback in what would have been the start of his political comeback nearly four years after resigning as governor following allegations of sexual harassme
title: Mamdani Stuns Cuomo in New York City Mayoral Primary

author: Elizabeth Robinson
description: An early assessment challenges Trump and Netanyahu's assertions that Iran's nuclear capabilities have been "obliterated."
title: Damage assessment of Iran nuclear sites and what to watch in NBA draft: Morning Rundown

description: For huge sections of the East Coast, it’s been a sweltering start to summer with more than 40 cities recording record highs and 150 million people under heat alerts from Maine to Texas. In South Carolina, 20 people were evaluated and a dozen sent to the hospital while swimming in water that was struck by lightning. NBC’s Sam Brock reports and TODAY’s Al Roker tracks the latest forecast.
title: Extreme Heat Puts Strain on Power Grids in Major Cities

description: The fragile ceasefire between Israel and Iran appears to be holding Tuesday, with the Israeli government lifting a semi-state of emergency, while in Tehran there have been celebrating what they say is a victory after its government withstood a joint attack from Israel and the United States. After an initial assessment of the U.S’s strike on Iran nuclear sites, there is still an open question on the missing uranium that Iran claims to have removed before the bombings. NBC’s Richard Engel repo
title: Fragile Ceasefire Between Israel and Iran Appears to Hold Tuesday

description: Faith Kipyegon will race against the clock in Paris on Thursday.
title: Faith Kipyegon bids to be first woman to run a mile under four minutes: 'I dare to try'

author: The Associated Press
description: JACKSON, Miss. — Mississippi's longest-serving death row inmate is set to be executed Wednesday, nearly five decades after he kidnapped and killed a bank loan officer's wife in a violent ransom scheme
title: Mississippi set to execute state's longest-serving death row inmate

author: Patrick Smith
description: Almost 150 million people were under heat advisories and warnings Wednesday morning, as the extreme heatwave that has brought sweltering conditions.
title: Eastern states swelter in record-breaking heat as 'extremely dangerous' conditions continue

author: Julia Ainsley
description: ICE told Congress in September that over 13,000 immigrants known to have committed murder remained at large. Since then, only 752 have been arrested.
title: Despite promise to remove 'worst of the worst,' ICE has arrested only 6% of known immigrant murderers

author: The Associated Press
description: A Japanese court said Wednesday it had found a U.S. Marine guilty of sexually assaulting a woman on Okinawa, sentencing him to seven years in prison.
title: Japanese court convicts a U.S. Marine in sexual assault, sentencing him to 7 years in prison

author: The Associated Press
description: A young Brazilian hiker who fell hundreds of feet from the ridge of a towering Indonesian volcano and was trapped there for almost four days was found dead.
title: Brazilian tourist found dead after falling from an Indonesian volcano

author: Andrew Greif
description: When Khaman Maluach’s freshman season at Duke University ended in April, the biggest question about the 7-foot-2 big man’s ability to play in the NBA had nothing to do with his shooting, size or skill
title: The U.S. revoked visas from a top basketball player's country. How the NBA kept his dream alive.

author: Jocelyn Shek
description: Independent and third-party voter registration is growing, largely at the expense of Democrats, an NBC News analysis of two decades of voter registration data shows.
title: Major-party voter registration slips as independents and third-parties surge

author: The Associated Press
description: Workers digging at Manhattan's World Trade Center site 15 years ago made an improbable discovery: sodden timbers from a boat built during the Revolutionary War that had been buried more than two centuries earlier.
title: A Revolutionary War-era boat is being painstakingly rebuilt after centuries buried beneath Manhattan

author: The Associated Press
description: The U.S. consulate in Hong Kong on Tuesday condemned the city’s government for what it called repression of U.S. Independence Day celebrations.
title: U.S. consulate condemns Hong Kong's government for 'repression' of Independence Day celebrations

author: David Ingram
description: One of the most talked-about staff members of the Trump administration’s Department of Government Efficiency has left the federal government, continuing a stream of DOGE-related departures.
title: Teen DOGE staffer 'Big Balls' has left the Trump administration

description: Vice President JD Vance praised President Trump's strikes on Iran saying the that the Unites States used the "Trump doctrine," during the Ohio Republican Party Dinner.
title: Vance says U.S. followed 'Trump doctrine' during Iran strikes

description: Former New York  Governor Andrew Cuomo thanked supporters and congratulated State Assemblyman Zohran Mamdani on his apparent win in the New York City mayoral primary. Mamdani leads the first-choice vote count.
title: Cuomo concedes NYC mayoral primary to Mamdani

author: Ben Kamisar
description: State Assemblyman Zohran Mamdani is the early leader as first-choice votes are tallied in the New York City Democratic mayoral primary, ahead of former New York Gov.
title: Zohran Mamdani leads as New York City mayoral primary heads for ranked choice tabulation

author: Jacob Soboroff
description: The Marine veteran son of a California gardener seen in a graphic video being repeatedly struck on the head by a masked Customs and Border Patrol agent and chased at gunpoint is pushing back against government statements that his father attacked agents with a weed trimmer
title: Marine veteran defends gardener father seen being hit by immigration agents in video

author: Rudy Chinchilla
description: Twenty people were injured when lightning struck a South Carolina beach Tuesday evening, officials said
title: 20 injured in lightning strike at South Carolina beach
